Zero-decimal currencies All API requests expect amounts to be provided in a currency’s smallest unit. For example, to charge 10 USD, provide an amount value of 1000 (i.e., 1000 cents).

For zero-decimal currencies, still provide amounts as an integer but without multiplying by 100. For example, to charge ¥500, provide an amount value of 500.

Zero-decimal currencies:

  • BIF
  • CLP
  • DJF
  • GNF
  • JPY
  • KMF
  • KRW
  • MGA
  • PYG
  • RWF
  • UGX
  • VND
  • VUV
  • XAF
  • XOF
  • XPF
